item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @verloren verloren
item.description:
@verloren wrote:

Yeah I figured you'd post here considering you were ipbanned on the server and the forums. Just shows you need to grow up you lil grumpalopagos.. stop being so heartbroken over an RSPS. Go grow up, try that for a change :palm:

Lol I wasn’t mad you banned me, i was mad all of us players were trying to get your attention and you ignored the shit out of us.
I posted sooo many posts and sent you multiple pms to try and help you.

L2 run a RSPS

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“verloren, post:6, topic:544093”]This kid was given this server from his friend.

He doens’t know how to code and is honestly the worst owner ever.

This server has been up for a bout a week or so and there are SOOOOO MANY BUGS and he doesn’t do anything it’s really pathetic.
he literally was on for 2 days just setting his stats and spawning items for himself.

Nobody play this pathetic game. It’s a shame becuse this server has so much potential.

-Gandalf ;)[/quote]
Yeah I figured you’d post here considering you were ipbanned on the server and the forums.
Just shows you need to grow up you lil grumpalopagos… stop being so heartbroken over an RSPS.
Go grow up, try that for a change :palm:

item.title: Closed
item.dc:creator: @verloren verloren
item.description:
@verloren wrote:

This kid was given this server from his friend.

He doens’t know how to code and is honestly the worst owner ever.

This server has been up for a bout a week or so and there are SOOOOO MANY BUGS and he doesn’t do anything it’s really pathetic.
he literally was on for 2 days just setting his stats and spawning items for himself.

He is rude to the community, doesn’t help players, when there are problems or bugs that the players need attending to he just logs out or ignores them. I helped about 3people a day at least and then whenever this kid was on, he just ignored everyone.

I adressed bugs, glitches, gameplay flaws, incorrect feautures, etc ,etc ,etc and he ignored everything (was too busy editing his phats and stats)

Nobody play this pathetic game. It’s a shame becuse this server has so much potential.

-Gandalf

Read full topic
